紅色醫療警示
全部都係龍頭醫院 伊院 屯門 聯合 瑪麗 瑪嘉烈 五間 基本上全部聯網都有份 得返威記

While the number of complaints against public hospitals rose from 2,216 in 2011-2012 to more than 2,800 in 2015-16, the number of serious incidents actually dropped from 47 in 2013-14 to 35 in 2015-16. This represents a rate of about two cases per one million patient appointments, compared with 23 cases per one million patient appointments in the Australian state of Victoria, which has a similar reporting system to Hong Kong’s.
